title: This Life is To Be With You - Novel Updates
tags: Cold Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Identity   Kind Love Interests   Older Love Interests   Short Story
author: 公子紫庭
description:
Being a direct disciple of the Qijue sect meant severing all seven emotions, six desires, righteousness, and morality. When Ye Zhi met that person, he finally understood why the sect had such a rule.

Like a water drop on the desert sand, he relieved his thirst and awakened his desire.

Like a moth to flame, he was seduced and willing to perish for that thing called emotions.

Abandoned all worldly attachments, in the end, couldn’t help yearning for one word, affection.>
